mdRecord.dcterms:title: Horse and Buildings, Southwest United States, ca. 1893
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This photograph shows a horse staring out from behind a wooden building at the photographer. The animal is tied to the lower part of the building An adobe building is seen at right. Though location is unknown, it is believed to be in either Texas, Arizona, or New Mexico, ca 1893. Overall image heavily faded from yellowish tan to yellow on sides. Marks at top right and bottom left
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
